thread.title: THE EVERYTHING SHIPPER: Amazon and the new age of delivery (AMZN)
thread.title_full: THE EVERYTHING SHIPPER: Amazon and the new age of delivery (AMZN)

author: BI Intelligence
title: THE EVERYTHING SHIPPER: Amazon and the new age of delivery (AMZN)
text:
print 
BII 
Retailers are looking to reduce their reliance on delivery partners and handle more of their own transportation and logistics themselves. 
The retailer paving the way into shipping is Amazon. 
BI Intelligence, Business Insider's premium research service, has compiled a slide deck that looks at what Amazon is doing in the shipping space and projects what the future of shipping will look like. 
Today, it can be yours for free. As an added bonus, you will gain immediate access to the teamâ€™s exclusive FREE newsletter, BI Intelligence Daily. 
To get your copy of this slide deck, simply click here .
